 Great files Frank, that tech, David keeps insisting the resurrection is co=
ming really soon, he also told me that "God, was planning to remake/redo th=
is planet Earth"=C2=A0 Don't know what about that, but David also claims th=
at Mars was once inhabited but they destroyed the planet, God didn't remake=
 that planet, but there are remnants of life still there, but it has to be =
dug into the ground to see who lived on it at once time.=C2=A0 David told m=
e that the Grail cup was at one time together with the Shroud of Turin, but=
 during the Crusades, it was taken, and put with some other things aboard a=
 ship headed for Europe, the ship sank so, the cup was lost at sea.=C2=A0 H=
e also said, had it been left with the Shroud, it would have been still aro=
und for people to see.=C2=A0 No one has pulled up the old ship yet, nor fou=
nd it, I didn't get what country they were headed for or who they were, all=
 I got was it was "during the Crusades." =C2=A0 Don't know about you folks =
but "when the Earth stops spinning," I sure don't want to be here then. sf
=


 



-----Original Message-----

The Aiwa is the best =
"box" I have at=C2=A0the moment, at least for clarity. The first two are mi=
nute long, cuz that's all Sound Recorder allows.

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"


<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Great f=
iles Frank, that tech, David keeps insisting the resurrection is coming rea=
lly soon, he also told me that "God, was planning to remake/redo this plane=
t Earth"  Don't know what about that, but David also claims that Mars =
was once inhabited but they destroyed the planet, God didn't remake that pl=
anet, but there are remnants of life still there, but it has to be dug into=
 the ground to see who lived on it at once time.  David told me that t=
he Grail cup was at one time together with the Shroud of Turin, but during =
the Crusades, it was taken, and put with some other things aboard a ship he=
aded for Europe, the ship sank so, the cup was lost at sea.  He also s=
aid, had it been left with the Shroud, it would have been still around for =
people to see.  No one has pulled up the old ship yet, nor found it, I=
 didn't get what country they were headed for or who they were, all I got w=
as it was "during the Crusades."   Don't know about you folks but "whe=
n the Earth stops spinning," I sure don't want to be here then. sf<br>
<br>=

</div>

<div> <br>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>
